actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that services performed by certain officers of closely-held corporations will not be subject to the Federal unemployment tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt services by officers of closed corporations wholly owned by themselves or their families from the unemployment tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that services performed by certain officers of closely-held corporations will not be subject to the Federal unemployment tax.
